reauth_confirm.title: Regenerate feed link
reauth_confirm.description: Home Assistant will create a new secret for {entry}. Share the refreshed feed link with your calendar app to continue syncing.

abort.reauth_successful: The feed link was regenerated successfully.
abort.unknown_entry: The configuration entry could not be found.

init.title: Feed settings
init.description:
Share this link with your calendar app:
{feed_url}
Selected calendars: {calendars}

Title rewrite: Use 'Title regex' and 'Title replacement' to capture groups and build a new title (for example, regex '^(.*) - .*' with replacement '$1' keeps everything before the dash).

Filtering: Use 'Filter regex' to skip events after the title rewrite (for example, '.*\b(cancelled|test)\b.*' removes cancelled or test events).

Diagnostics: Download the masked feed URL from Settings → System → Diagnostics if you need to share troubleshooting details.
Repairs: If a selected calendar disappears, Home Assistant opens a repair issue so you can pick an available entity.

data_description.feed_url: Copy and share this link. Enable 'Create new feed link' if you need to rotate the secret.
data_description.past_days: How many days prior to today to include (0-365).
data_description.future_days: How many days ahead to include (0-365).
data_description.title_regex: Capture groups to rewrite a title, e.g. '^(.*) - .*'.
data_description.title_replacement: Used with Title regex, e.g. '$1' keeps the first group.
data_description.filter_regex: Skip events whose rewritten title matches, e.g. '.*\b(cancelled|test)\b.*'.

missing_calendar.title: Configured calendars are missing
missing_calendar.description: Home Assistant can no longer find all calendars configured for {entry}. Update the iCal feed options and pick available calendar entities. Missing calendars: {calendars}.
